Html:
hey,

I am interested in the future of the WPF Toolkit. The source code is fully available now, but what are the plans for the future?
Is the toolkit going to be closed source or will it be open source, although it is going to be moved into the .NET Framework?

Thanks!

Hi,

I known that it will be moved into the .NET framework 4.0 and the bug fixes will no long apply to WPF Toolkit after moving into the framework. But I also want to know is there any release on Sept 2009?

Hi,

As tonytam mentioned, all the controls in the WPF Toolkit will be ported into the .NET 4.0 frame work + bug fixes.  There may be a new version of the WPF Toolkit released sometime in Oct 2009.  This new release will include numerous fixes to issues posted here and requested by other customers.  However, this release schedule is speculative at this point.

Thanks,

Saied K.
